cast.name: 德拉戈什·布库尔 Dragos Bucur

this_title: Şi caii sunt verzi pe pereţi
introduction: A story about and the illusion of getting rich in Romania. In a country where stories of striking it rich are everywhere, anyone thinks such a thing is not only possible, but it's easily achievable. The storyline follows two destinies: one is of a young couple, Marius and Cosmina. Marius wrote an imaginary name on a lottery promotion ticket just to drag Cosmina. And the draw ma...
